tasks.task_desc: Put a bar of soap on a shelf.

high_descs: Move to face the back of the toilet against the wall
Pick up the sponge on top of the toilet tank on the left
Carry the sponge over to the wire shelving rack in the corner of the room
Place the sponge on the second shelf from the top on the shelving unit
tasks.task_desc: Move a sponge to the wire shelf

high_descs: Turn around and step forward, then turn left to go to the toilet.
Pick up the leftmost sponge on the back of the toilet.
Turn around and move forward, then turn left to go to the wall adjacent to the tub, then turn right and go to the metal shelf.
Put the sponge on the metal shelf.
tasks.task_desc: Move a sponge to the metal shelf.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the toilet.
Pick up the leftmost sponge.
Turn around and veer left to the metal cart in the corner of the room.
Place the sponge on the cart in front of the candle.
tasks.task_desc: Place a sponge on a cart.
